author: chug
msg: QPID-4775: C++ Broker add ACL property checks for delete queue and exchange.
0-18-based patch from Pavel Moravec was adjusted for trunk.
Removed size properties from list of queue deletion check parameters.

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Nominate fixes for issue #4355 'svn_client_log5 broken with
multiple revisions which span a rename'.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Renamed 'shallowCopy' as 'append', with slight semantic change, prior removal.
We will remove that 'append' method in the next commit because it is replaced by the copy constructors,
and appending (or merging) metadata may be tricky since there is various way to merge bounding box,
child metadata objects, etc. We do this commit prior removal in order to have a starting point in the
history if we decide in a future version that we need append functionality.
